section.title: Readers of this Manual
section.para: This manual is written for operators who install, operate, and maintain SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring. It also describes how the operator uses SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring for monitoring.

The manual assumes that you have profound knowledge of OpenStack and SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring, especially the individual services SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring is composed of. For installing the SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring components, you must be familiar with the administration and operation of LINUX systems.
